name: lib/document/index.js

properties.name: filepath
properties.description: path to file to be uploaded

name: create
description:
Uploads a file and creates a document.
This endpoint accepts .pdf, .doc, .docx, .odt, .rtf, .png, .jpg, .jpeg, .gif, .bmp, .xml, .xls, .xlsx, .ppt, .pptx file types

name: DocumentFieldExtractParams
description: Upload document with field extract payload

properties.name: filepath
properties.description: path to file to be uploaded

name: DocumentFieldExtractResponse
description: Upload document with field extract response data

name: fieldextract
description:
Uploads a file that contains SignNow Document Field Tags.
This endpoint only accepts .pdf (you may convert the document from .doc or .docx to .pdf)

params.name: data
params.description: upload document with field extract payload

name: DocumentListParams
description: Payload to receive user's document list

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: id of user that uploaded document

properties.name: page_count
properties.description: amount of pages in the document

properties.name: original_filename
properties.description: original filename with document format (.pdf, .doc, etc...)

properties.name: origin_document_id
properties.description: an id of original document (if document is a copy)

properties.name: template
properties.description: is document a template or not

properties.name: origin_user_id
properties.description: id of user who created document

properties.name: thumbnail
properties.description: thumbnail urls with different sizes (small, medium, large)

properties.name: radiobuttons
properties.description: checked radiobuttons after document was signed

properties.name: field_validators
properties.description: validation rules for fields (date fields, payment fields etc.)

params.name: data
params.description: payload to receive user's document list

name: DocumentThumbnails
description: Document thumbnail urls with different sizes (small, medium, large)

name: DocumentViewResponse
description: Document view response of specific document

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: id of user that uploaded document

properties.name: page_count
properties.description: amount of pages in the document

properties.name: original_filename
properties.description: original filename with document format (.pdf, .doc, etc...)

properties.name: origin_document_id
properties.description: an id of original document (if document is a copy)

properties.name: template
properties.description: is document a template or not

properties.name: thumbnail
properties.description: thumbnail urls with different sizes (small, medium, large)

properties.name: radiobuttons
properties.description: checked radiobuttons after document was signed

properties.name: field_validators
properties.description: validation rules for fields (date fields, payment fields etc.)

properties.name: pages
properties.description: list of document pages with page sources and page size.

properties.name: custom_defined_option
properties.description: if 'true' user can change values, if 'false' user can only read

properties.name: term
properties.description: name of field which will participate in calculation formula

properties.name: term
properties.description: a part of formula parsed into tree

properties.name: custom_defined_option
properties.description: if 'true' user can change values, if 'false' user can only read

name: update
description:
Updates an existing document.
Adds fields (signature, text, initials, checkbox, radiobutton group, calculated) and elements (signature, text, check).
Every call of this method will add only specified fields into document.
Old fields will be removed

properties.name: collapsed
properties.description: if true document will be downloaded with embedded field and element values

properties.name: withHistory
properties.description: if true document will be downloaded with history

name: download
description:
Downloads document with embedded fields and elements.
By default document is downloaded without history. To download document with history set `withHistory` option to `true`.

properties.name: link
properties.description: link to download specified document in PDF format

name: share
description:
Requests a link to download document with embedded fields and elements
Link can be used once and then will expire

properties.name: role_id
properties.description: role unique id (can be discovered in document details)

properties.name: to
properties.description: array of signers or email of single signer

properties.name: cc
properties.description: array with emails of copy receivers

properties.name: email
properties.description: ability to disable invitation by email. to disabale email assign value 'disable'

name: DocumentFieldInviteResponse
description: Create document field invite response data

name: DocumentFreeformInviteResponse
description: Create document free form invite response data

name: invite
description:
Creates an invite to sign a document.
You can create a simple free form invite(s) or a role-based invite(s).

name: DocumentFieldInviteCancelResponse
description: Cancel document field invite response data

properties.name: status
properties.description: status of field invite cancellation, e.g. 'success'

name: cancelFieldInvite
description: Cancels an invite to a document

name: cancelInvite
description: Cancels an invite to a document

properties.name: removeOriginalDocuments
properties.description: if true original documents will be removed

name: merge
description:
Merges existing documents into one.
By default original documents are not removed after merging. To remove original documents set `removeOriginalDocuments` option to `true`.

properties.name: json_attributes
properties.description: field attributes (e.g. font, style, size etc.)

properties.name: version
properties.description: version of signed document (incremented after each signature addition)

name: history
description: Retrieves a document action log (history) data

properties.name: cancelInvites
properties.description: ability to cancel all document invites during deletion

name: remove
description: Removes a specified document from folder

name: lib/document-group/index.js

params.name: data
params.description: view document with field extract payload

return.description: is there any field invite in given document
is document a template or not
resolves with id of new document

properties.name: ids
properties.description: array of document or template ids for document group creation

name: create
description:
Creates document group with specified documents or templates.
At least one document or template must contain fields. Documents should not contain pending invites.

name: DocumentGroupItem
description: Details of single Document in group

properties.name: has_credit_card_number
properties.description: Document has Credit Card number attached

properties.name: thumbnail

properties.description: time in seconds for which the token was issued

name: lib/template/index.js

params.name: data
params.description: view document with field extract payload

properties.name: removeOriginalDocument
properties.description: if true original document will be removed

name: create
description:
Creates a template by copying an existing unfulfilled and not requested for sign document.
By default original document is not removed after template creation. To remove original document set `removeOriginalDocument` option to `true`.

name: duplicate
description:
Creates a new document by copying a template.
If a name is not supplied then document name will be set to the original template's name by default.

name: TemplateInviteResponse
description: Create invite with template response data

name: invite
description:
Creates an invite to sign a template.
You can create a simple free form invite(s) or a role-based invite(s).
The method copies a template into document and creates an invite using created document.

name: remove
description: Removes a specified template from folder

properties.name: is_logged_in

types: {start_date: string, end_date: string, start_timestamp: number, end_timestamp: number}

companies
properties.description: companies where user is a member of

properties.name: teams
properties.description: teams where user is a member of

properties.name: organization_settings
properties.description: organization specific settings where user is a member of

name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "@signnow/api-client",
  "description": "SignNow REST Service Wrapper",
  "version": "1.6.0",
  "author": {
    "name": "SignNow Team",
    "email": "api@signnow.com"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "signnow",
    "document",
    "sign",
    "online",
    "electronic",
    "signature",
    "api",
    "client"
  ],
  "main": "lib/index.js",
  "repository": "github:signnow/SignNowNodeSDK",
  "scripts": {
    "lint": "./node_modules/.bin/eslint '**/*.js'",
    "lint:fix": "./node_modules/.bin/eslint '**/*.js' --fix",
    "docs": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc",
    "prepublishOnly": "npm install eslint@6.0.1 && npm run lint"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "chai": "*",
    "esdoc": "1.1.0",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "1.0.0",
    "esdoc-external-nodejs-plugin": "1.0.0",
    "esdoc-inject-style-plugin": "1.0.0",
    "esdoc-node": "1.0.4",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "1.0.0",
    "eslint": "6.0.1",
    "husky": "3.0.2",
    "mocha": "*"
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=6.4.0"
  },
  "files": [
    "lib",
    "utils",
    "bin"
  ],
  "bin": {
    "sn:cancel-field-invite": "./bin/cancel-field-invite.js",
    "sn:cancel-freeform-invite": "./bin/cancel-freeform-invite.js",
    "sn:create-document-group-template": "./bin/create-document-group-template.js",
    "sn:create-document-group": "./bin/create-document-group.js",
    "sn:create-document": "./bin/create-document.js",
    "sn:create-field-invite": "./bin/create-field-invite.js",
    "sn:create-freeform-invite": "./bin/create-freeform-invite.js",
    "sn:create-signing-link": "./bin/create-signing-link.js",
    "sn:create-template": "./bin/create-template.js",
    "sn:create-user": "./bin/create-user.js",
    "sn:document-group-invite": "./bin/document-group-invite.js",
    "sn:document-history": "./bin/document-history.js",
    "sn:document-list": "./bin/document-list.js",
    "sn:download-document": "./bin/download-document.js",
    "sn:extract-fields": "./bin/extract-fields.js",
    "sn:get-access-token": "./bin/get-access-token.js",
    "sn:invite-documentgroup-template": "./bin/invite-documentgroup-template.js",
    "sn:merge-documents": "./bin/merge-documents.js",
    "sn:refresh-token": "./bin/refresh-token.js",
    "sn:remove-document": "./bin/remove-document.js",
    "sn:remove-template": "./bin/remove-template.js",
    "sn:share-document": "./bin/share-document.js",
    "sn:template-field-invite": "./bin/template-field-invite.js",
    "sn:template-freeform-invite": "./bin/template-freeform-invite.js",
    "sn:update-document": "./bin/update-document.js",
    "sn:user-info": "./bin/user-info.js",
    "sn:verify-access-token": "./bin/verify-access-token.js",
    "sn:view-document-group": "./bin/view-document-group.js",
    "sn:view-document": "./bin/view-document.js",
    "sn:view-documentgroup-template": "./bin/view-documentgroup-template.js"
  },
  "license": "MIT"
}
name: package.json

it27
description: should create a new signing link and return two urls

it32

name: test/template.test.js
it34
description: should create a template by flattening an existing document and return the template id

name: it35
description: should create a template by flattening an existing document and return the template id

it38
description: should create a new user account

it43
